meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unnecessary or excessive.
meanings.sent1: The teacher asked the students to remove the superfluousnesses from their essays.
meanings.sent2: The superfluousnesses in her speech made it hard to understand the main point.
meanings.sent3: The party decorations were so full of superfluousnesses that they almost covered the entire room.
meanings.sent4: His explanation was filled with so many superfluousnesses that it felt like wading through a swamp.
meanings.sent5: The clutter in the garage was a perfect example of superfluousnesses.

meanings.sent1: The superfluousnesses of the decorations made the room feel cramped.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the superfluousnesses of his constant apologies.
meanings.sent3: The superfluousnesses of the menu made it hard to decide what to order.
meanings.sent4: The superfluousnesses of his wardrobe were evident in the overflowing closet.
meanings.sent5: The superfluousnesses of the paperwork made it difficult to find the important documents.
